name: QUACK!
description:
It's all out war between the pigeons and the seagulls at the food truck festival! You are a pigeon trying to earn your territory and ultimately beat the terrifying TOWER OF SEAGULLS!

Pick up banana peels to speed up, french fries to refill your ammo, and ketchup packets to heal!

This level/prototype was made for Dawson College's Independent Video Game Design program for the Level Design class.

Devs:

Jeremie Lemonde (FuncDetail)

Stefanie Grandchamp-Dube (Spac3Gh0s7)
